title: Green Beans with Balsamic Pearl Onions

preparations.content: Place balsamic vinegar and sugar into mixing bowl and without measuring cup cook <b>18 min/Varoma/speed 3<b>.
Add pearl onions and without measuring cup cook <b>13 min/Varoma//speed 1<b>.
Place Varoma dish on top of mixing bowl lid and weigh in green beans. Secure Varoma lid and cook <b>5-7 min/Varoma//speed 1<b>.
Transfer green beans to a serving platter and top with balsamic glazed onions. Garnish with fresh lemon zest and almonds. Serve hot.

hintsAndTricks: The balsamic glaze can be made in advance and stored in an airtight container.

Frozen pearl onions will add water to the glaze making it thin again. Thicken the glaze by cooking a further <b>5 min/Varoma//speed 1<b>. Alternatively, if onions don't contain enough moisture to prevent burning, you can add balsamic vinegar a few teaspoons at a time, before or while steaming green beans.
